name: Super Disc Box
description:
Gamepad, or Arrow Keys + Z/X

Are you ready to get sliced in half? The year is 2089 and Vlambeer's SUPER CRATE BOX is coming to bring back the glory of the golden arcade age, when all that really mattered was getting on that high score list and a giant disc has appeared in orbit of Jupiter. Step into the oversized space suit of a brave scientist and grab your baseball cap and loosen your pants, it's time to explore this sprawling intergalactic slaughterhouse and fight endless hordes of enemies and collect every weapon crate you can.

Prepare for an arcade delight with tight controls, refreshing game mechanics, cracking retro art and a terribly hip chiptune soundtrack.

And remember: what kills you only makes you stronger.
